Room.Name: Skies Over Kista Forest
Room.ShortDescription: Below are tall pines and oak, the great forest of Kista. 80.n0.e23.s8.w0
Room.LongDescription: The sky to the west is heavy clouds, and probably would hide your position indicator if you flew in there. The forest appears to be unbroken for vast distances, except to the south, where a small, black castle sits alone in the forest, surrounded by a moat.
